text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea maxwelliana is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is a tree found in Sumatra and Peninsular Malaysia. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. 1998.  Shorea maxwelliana.   2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.   Downloaded on 23 August 2007.
